description: The subject aims to provide students an in‐depth lucid review of essential human resources concepts and theories. It will facilitate students to discuss and analyze contemporary issues in the management of human capital in business industry in both macro‐ and micro‐perspectives.

syllabus.zh:
1. Strategic Human Capital Management
2. Organizational culture and its impacts on human capital
3. Chinese Culture – by Faculty of Humanity •
4. Corporate Creativity and Employee Creativity
5. Job Satisfaction & Organizational Commitment in the Hospitality Industry
6. Strategic Downsizing, Separation and Outsourcing • International Human Capital Management and Expatriate Management •
7. Training and Development – Experiential Learning and Facilitation Techniques •
8. Career Development in Human Capital: Assessments and Structure of Succession Planning
9. Contemporary Issues and Challenges facing Human Capital Management in the Business Industry

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 瞭解管理會計系統功能
了解如何應用管理會計技術到管理決策中
了解管理會計如何在企業組織中發揮功能與價值
培養批判性思考和整合能力
